mechanics.trigger: A creature makes an attack roll against the target
mechanics.condition: Target is affected by Blur AND Attacker relies on sight AND Attacker cannot see through illusions (e.g., does not have Truesight or Blindsight)
mechanics.outcome: Attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll

description_text: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it doesn't rely on sight, as with blindsight, or can see through illusions, as with truesight.
